attributes.action: Replace house of lords with a house of equal delegates from all 4 home nations
attributes.additional_details: This would make parliament fair to the people, but also give equal voice to all the nation's in our union. Scotland has over 50 seats in the commons, which doesn't represent the people fairly given the population of Scotland compared to the rest of the union. Make the commons fair to the people, and replace the dated house of lords with a house representive of the nation's.
attributes.background: Parliament is not representive of the peopme due to the population disparity between all four home nations. Why not make the house of commons representative of the people, and replace the dated house of lords with an equal number of delegates from all four home nations.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure exactly how you'd like the House of Lords to be reformed, for example whether you'd like it be an elected chamber, or how you'd like to make the House of Commons more representative of the populations of the nations of the UK. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
